## Load packages
```{r}
#| code-fold: true
library(here)
library(readr)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Read data
```{r}
raw_data <- read_csv(here("data", "raw", "MARINe_data", "longterm", "phototranraw_download.csv"))
```

## Clean data
```{r}
# Source cleaning function
source(here("scripts", "functions", "clean_longterm.R"))

# Apply cleaning function
longterm <- clean_longterm(raw_data)
```

```{r}
# south
south <- longterm %>%
  filter(latitude >= 34.36 & latitude < 34.48)

unique(south$site_code) # 5 sites
unique(south$lumping_code) # 38 lumping codes
```

```{r}
# north
north <- longterm %>%
  filter(latitude >= 34.48 & latitude <= 35.25)

unique(north$site_code) # 5 sites
unique(north$lumping_code) # 38 lumping codes
```
